Functionalities at a glance:

 • Push notifications: Super fast or delayed - just as you need it. Decide to get all highlights as a push or reduce it and choose kickoff, final whistle and goals. Are you watching the game in a livestream? Then choose the delayed notifications so you don't get informed too early and can enjoy the excitement. Because our new push notifications are now really fast! For the visually impaired, there is also now the option to have push messages read aloud.

 • Matches: You can find many facts and figures about the season in the "Matches" module. Simply filter by competition, select a game and matches, table and lineups are displayed. There are also some statistics for the players, which will be expanded in the near future. In addition to the first team, you can now also find an overview of the U23 matches - but not yet in detail.

 • Navigation: Swipe and type, we can do it all! The traditional menu bar is back, providing you the opportunity to jump quickly into certain categories. To switch between news, matches, shops and more, you can simply swipe left or right.

 • News: On your startscreen you can find the most recent news, videos and social media postings about BVB. Simply swiping up and down you can get up to speed quickly on everything relevant about our club.

 • Shops: Find an overview on BVB products, experiences and partner offerings. All you need to get your black and yellow heart beat faster!

 • More: Under the menu bar „more“ you get access to many more features, such as the BVB podcast, the official betting game, the feedback corner and much more.

 • Videos: BVB-TV and Youtube videos can now directly be accessed through the App, giving you fast access to our newest video content.

 • Feedback form: Your opinion, wishes and needs are especially important to us. The app is for you, and you can tell us in this way what you want. What's going great, what could be better? Do you have new ideas? Then let us know!
